body:
It's been about 7 months since I started posting videos for avicus on youtube and now it's finally happening boys. I upgrade my PC today and got a really nice build and I can finally record games without having lag so hurray! Also, I got unbanned from Avicus after my month ban and I'm glad I did get banned for that because it made me think to stop acting like a fool and getting myself banned.

If you guys don't know what my youtube channel resolves on, I make Avicus Highlights, Avicus Funny Moments, scrimmages etc. It would be hugely appreciative if you could check out my channel just for a few seconds and see what you think :).

I'm editing a video atm now and I'll release it under this post for you guys :)

YT Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyUTAatWzU92DNOUd7BD1Zw

Avicus Highlights #8 -https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WnMfupsO2so&feature=youtu.be :) Enjoy <33

title: I'm back for good

replies.body: Hey zegita long time no see :D Welcome back. It's me Eric if you don't know. i do somewhat enjoy your videos, just put good music and good render settings, i subbed.
